visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with inverted polar coordinates. The chart should have a custom title, styled axes and labels, and a single data series. The chart should also have specific margins, background, and legend configurations.

title.text: Custom xAxis' angle on inverted polar chart

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart with inverted polar coordinates. The chart is titled 'Custom xAxis' angle on inverted polar chart'. The x-axis is customized with an angle of 324 degrees, a tick interval of 1, and a line width of 2 with a specific color. The x-axis labels are styled with a z-index of 10, an x-offset of 5, and a y-offset of -5, all with the same color as the axis line. The y-axis is set to range from 0 to 10. The chart includes a single data series with no border and data points ranging from 1 to 9. The chart has a top margin of 25 pixels, ensuring proper spacing from the top of the container.
